--- select_unnest_with_offset_and_alias.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST([1,2,3]) AS value WITH OFFSET AS num

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      18,
            end:      42,
            Implicit: false,
            Expr:     &parser.ArrayLiteral{
              pos:    25,
              end:    32,
              Type:   nil,
              Values: []parser.Expr{
                &parser.IntLiteral{
                  pos:   26,
                  end:   27,
                  Base:  10,
                  Value: "1",
                },
                &parser.IntLiteral{
                  pos:   28,
                  end:   29,
                  Base:  10,
                  Value: "2",
                },
                &parser.IntLiteral{
                  pos:   30,
                  end:   31,
                  Base:  10,
                  Value: "3",
                },
              },
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   34,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  37,
                end:  42,
                Name: "value",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: &parser.WithOffset{
              pos: 43,
              end: 61,
              As:  &parser.AsAlias{
                pos:   55,
                Alias: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  58,
                  end:  61,
                  Name: "num",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3]) AS value WITH OFFSET AS num
